Mr. Speaker, time is up. The ACA tax credits are expiring December  31.

As congressional Republicans seek about $4.5 trillion to       extend expiring tax cuts, the Federal Government will need to       find savings elsewhere.

You are going to give that $4.5 trillion that disproportionately go  to the wealthy, and you are…
